mapper.select: WITH RECURSIVE TEMP_T_USER_SYS_MENU ( MENU_NM , CONNECT_BY_ROOT , MENU_ID , UP_MENU_ID , AUTH_ID , LEVEL , PATH , CYCLE ) AS ( SELECT MENU_NM , USM.MENU_ID AS CONNECT_BY_ROOT , USM.MENU_ID , USM.UP_MENU_ID , USMA.AUTH_ID , 1 AS level , ARRAY[USM.MENU_ID::TEXT] , FALSE FROM T_USER_SYS_MENU USM INNER JOIN T_USER_SYS_MENU_AUTH USMA ON USM.MENU_ID = USMA.MENU_ID AND USMA.AUTH_ID = #{search.authId} WHERE UP_MENU_ID IS NULL UNION ALL SELECT USM.MENU_NM , CONNECT_BY_ROOT , USM.MENU_ID , USM.UP_MENU_ID , USMA.AUTH_ID , LEVEL + 1 , PATH||USM.MENU_ID , USM.MENU_ID = ANY(PATH) FROM T_USER_SYS_MENU USM INNER JOIN TEMP_T_USER_SYS_MENU TTUSM ON TTUSM.MENU_ID = USM.UP_MENU_ID INNER JOIN T_USER_SYS_MENU_AUTH USMA ON USM.MENU_ID = USMA.MENU_ID AND USMA.AUTH_ID = #{search.authId} AND NOT CYCLE ) SELECT LPAD(' ', 4*(LEVEL-1)) || MENU_NM AS PADDED_MENU_NM , MENU_NM , CONNECT_BY_ROOT , TUSM.MENU_ID , UP_MENU_ID , LEVEL , PATH , AUTH_ID FROM TEMP_T_USER_SYS_MENU TUSM INNER JOIN T_QCK_MENU_USER QMU ON TUSM.MENU_ID = QMU.MENU_ID AND QMU.USER_ID = #{search.userId} ORDER BY PATH
SELECT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM T_QCK_MENU_USER WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} AND MENU_ID = #{menuId} LIMIT 1 )
